name: CLZN Crew Neck
description: This will definitely be one of the softest sweatshirt that you will ever own. This CLZN sweatshirt is printed on Alternative Apparel using the softest water based ink. Print on the front as well as a back neck print. I recommend ordering a size up from your regular shirt size since these are more slim fitting.

name: CLZN Script Tee
description: This extremely soft tee is hand printed by yours truly using water based ink to give it that no feel/vintage look! As for the fit, the shirts are printed on an American Apparel 50/50 tee so you can expect them to be more fitting but length is definitely not a concern. The shirts are UNISEX so I recommend girls to order a size down from their usual women's size and for guys to order a size up if they want it looser fitting. Expect minimal to zero shrinkage and for the shirt to be just as soft coming out of the wash as it was when you bought it!
